item.title: How to git ice barrage to attack multiple npcs?
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); animation(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((600*playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((600*playerLevel[3]), 3); } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } } } else { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; setAnimation(711); hitDiff = 0; animation(85, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[3]), 3); }

there you go mate good luck with youâ€™r server
